title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.45 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.45 - Fees

State Regulations

ParksCorp shall periodically establish any fees it deems
necessary or appropriate for the administration, maintenance and use by the
public of such park facilities, including fees incident to the administration
of the application for and the issuance of a permit, and/or based on
consideration of such factors as impact of activities on the general public's
use of the parks, costs and other factors affecting parks maintenance and
operation, fair value when a commercial enterprise or substantial fund raising
is involved, risks of damage, potential for liability, and other matters
related to sound operation of the parks, subject to the approval of the BPCA. Fee schedules for such facilities shall be published and posted at the offices
of ParksCorp. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

9003.45

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
